Package hep.aida.dev

Interface Summary
IDevMutableStore Developer level interface to an IMutableStore.
IDevTree An interface to a Tree that allows adding nodes.
IMutableStore Interface to an IOnDemandStore that can change with time.
IOnDemandStore An interface to the store that can provide fine-grained data.
IStore An interface to be implemented by AIDA compatible Store.
IStoreFactory An interface to a factory that create IStore.
